section_highlights.title: Planning and Building Disaster Recovery Solutions
section_highlights.description: This course introduces the concepts of disaster recovery and high availability and how they relate to IBM Cloud.

tiles.title: You can now select the DR location while configuring the orchestrator, making it easier to define the target region for orchestrator VM deployment. This enhancement provides greater control over regional DR setup.

The deployment flow now allows dynamic selection of the DR Power Virtual Server workspace based on the chosen DR location and DR Schematics workspace, ensuring better alignment of resources and reducing setup errors.

A new external standby orchestrator interface is now available, enabling orchestrators to recognize and manage a standby node for improved failover support and operational resilience. This feature strengthens HA capabilities by streamlining standby node configuration.
